statements: UPDATE security_assessment SET vulnerability_count = 10, remediation_status = TRUE WHERE assessment_id = 1
UPDATE security_assessment SET assessment_date = '2022-09-15', assessment_name = 'Quarterly Review' WHERE assessment_id = 2
UPDATE security_assessment SET remediation_status = TRUE, vulnerability_count = vulnerability_count + 1, assessment_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE assessment_id = 101;
UPDATE security_assessment SET assessment_date = NOW(), assessment_name = 'Security Review', vulnerability_count = 10, remediation_status = FALSE WHERE assessment_id = 102;
UPDATE security_assessments SET assessment_name = 'New Assessment Name', assessment_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE assessment_id = 1;
UPDATE vulnerability_scans SET scan_status = 'Completed', scan_results = '{"vulnerabilities": ["Critical", "High"]}' WHERE scan_id = 5;
UPDATE security_assessments SET assessment_name = 'Security Audit', assessment_date = '2022-10-15', assessment_description = 'In-depth security analysis' WHERE assessment_id = 101
UPDATE vulnerability_scans SET scan_status = 'Completed', scan_results = '{"critical": 2, "high": 5, "medium": 10, "low": 0}' WHERE scan_id = 201
UPDATE security_assessments SET assessment_score = 90 WHERE assessment_id = 1;
UPDATE vulnerability_scans SET scan_type = 'External' , vulnerabilities_found = 15 WHERE scan_id = 2;
UPDATE security_assessments SET assessment_score = 85 WHERE assessment_id = 1;
UPDATE vulnerability_scans SET scan_type = 'External' , vulnerabilities_found = 10 WHERE scan_id = 3;
UPDATE security_assessments SET severity_level = 'High' WHERE assessment_id = 1;
UPDATE vulnerability_scans SET scan_results = 'No critical vulnerabilities found' WHERE scan_id = 2;
UPDATE security_assessments SET severity_level='High', assessment_date='2022-09-15' WHERE assessment_id=1;
UPDATE assessment_results SET remediation_steps='Update firewall settings, apply security patches', risk_level='Medium' WHERE result_id=2;
UPDATE SecurityAssessments SET assessment_name = 'Updated Assessment 1', assessment_score = 75.5 WHERE assessment_id = 1;
UPDATE VulnerabilityScans SET severity_level = 'High', scan_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE scan_id = 3;
UPDATE SecurityAssessments SET assessment_score = 8.2, assessor_name = 'John Doe' WHERE assessment_id = 123;
UPDATE VulnerabilityScans SET severity_level = 'High', scanned_system = 'Server-01' WHERE scan_id = 456;
